posts.title: Günün Tam Sürümü: SoftOrbits Photo Editor Pro 3.2
posts.text:
SoftOrbits Photo Editor Pro 3.2 Turn your digital snapshot into a perfect postcard! 08 Ekim 2017 10:00 4 İndirmek için kalan süre 00:00:00 
Turn your digital snapshot into a perfect postcard! Be it a passer-by, a hanging wire or just an unwanted shadow, you can make your picture free of distracting objects with ease. Remove unwanted objects in just a click! Simple Photo Editor will help you selecting the whole object and re-create what's beneath it, producing a clean, perfect postcard free of blemishes and distractions.

posts.title: SNES Classic Edition hack'lendi
posts.text:
İLGİLİ HABER Switch'in içindeki gizli oyun! 
GitHub'da yayınlanan hack'in yeni sürümü , SNES Classic Mini desteğiyle geliyor. Şu an oyunların yüzde 75' i düzgün çalışıyor. Oyunları cihazda çalıştırabilmek için özel bir formata dönüştürmeniz gerekiyor. hackhi2 adlı araç, sadece SNES Classic Mini değil, minyatür NES, Famicom ve Super Famicom'la da çalışıyor. İLGİLİ HABER Doom için sevindiren haber! SNES Classic Mini Hack: How to add your own games with HakChi2 In this video I show you how you can install your own custom SNES roms into the recently released Super Nintendo Classic Mini console. This is an early version of the exploit, so it's quite a few steps and a reasonably complicated process which is likely to become a bit easier in the coming few weeks. However if you want to get started adding your own Roms to the SNES mini today, this is the only method I am aware of which will allow for this. You'll need to download each of the following files in order to follow this video - The Hakchi Tool can be downloaded from here: Python 3.60 can be downloaded from here: (scroll down to bottom of the page to find the download links) Notepad++ can be downloaded from here: The sfc2sfrom.py script can be downloaded from here: Make sure you install Python to the "C:\Python36\" directory You will also need to make sure you source your ROM files in .SFC file extension. If you have any questions or suggestions feel free to either let me know here in the comments section, or on our discord server which you can connect to with the following link: Thanks for watching and subscribing, cheers. 
Cihazınızı modifiye etmek elbette riskli bir iş. Bu işlemi yaparken konsolu tuğlaya dönüştürme ihtimaliniz her zaman var. Bunun yanında ROM'ları elde etmeden ve el altında bulundurmadan önce yasaları göz önünde bulundurmak gerekiyor.

thread.title: Günün Tam Sürümü: Leawo Music Recorder 2.3
thread.title_full: Günün Tam Sürümü: Leawo Music Recorder 2.3

posts.title: Günün Tam Sürümü: Leawo Music Recorder 2.3
posts.text:
The easiest way to record music and audio of all audio sources on Windows 14 Ekim 2017 10:00 İndirmek için kalan süre 00:00:00 
As a highly-praised audio recording software, Leawo Music Recorder can help music lovers easily get any audio source. It can act as streaming audio recorder to record Mic audio and other built-in input audio stream. It can also serve as a computer audio recorder to record computer audio files in local music library. The recorded audio can be saved into MP3 or WAV format as users like. With the assistant of the recording Task Scheduler, this music recording software allows users to schedule recording upon preset recording start time and recording duration. Leawo Music Recorder can also automatically download and add music tags like album, album cover, artist, song name, etc. to the recordings. Key features: Records audio and music from computer audio and online music sources like AOL Music, Last.fm, etc.; Records Mic or other built-in input audio stream like Realtek High Definition Audio, Realtek Digital Input, etc.; Recording Task Scheduler sets recording start time and recording duration; Records audios of any built-in input or computer stream audio and save in MP3 or WAV format; Automatically downloads and adds music tags including title, artist, album, year, genre and album artwork to recordings; Supports manual music tags editing with a built-in music tag editor; Sets time gap to let this music recording software automatically filter or split recordings; Play back recordings for preview and create, edit or delete playlist for recordings; Apply recorded music files to iTunes music library with one click. Leawo Music Recorder 2.3 Sistem Gereksinimleri Windows XP/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10; Processor: 1 GHz or above Intel/AMD; RAM: 512MB (1024MB or above recommended); Others: Internet Connection Fiyatı $29.99 ama bugün için tamamen ücretsiz Dosya Boyutu 27.6 MB

posts.title: Günün Tam Sürümü: IObit Malware Fighter Pro 5.3.0
posts.text:
IObit Malware Fighter Pro 5.3.0 An advanced malware removal and browser protection utility 22 Ekim 2017 10:00 6 İndirmek için kalan süre 00:00:00 
IObit Malware Fighter 5 is an advanced malware removal and browser protection utility that detects and removes infections and other security threats. By integrating the world-leading anti-virus engine from Bitdefender and combining it with the improved IObit Malware Fighter engine, IObit Malware Fighter 5 is able to provide a very comprehensive and reliable security solution. With the new Anti-Ransomware Engine, Camera Guard and Download Protection, and the greatly improved Surfing Protection and Ads Removal, IObit Malware Fighter 5 is able to detect and remove the latest spyware, adware, Trojans, keyloggers, bots, worms, and hijackers. 
Please note: the license is provided for 6 months IObit Malware Fighter Pro 5.3.0 Sistem Gereksinimleri Windows 7 ve üzeri Fiyatı $39.95 ama bugün için tamamen ücretsiz Dosya Boyutu 40.2 MB
